title: First blood
subject_group: Literature/American literature - Film and video adaptations
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Vietnam War, 1961-1975 - Psychological aspects
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Vietnam War, 1961-1975 - Motion pictures and the war
description: Based on the novel by David Morrell, "First Blood" began a trilogy of action films starring Sylvester Stallone as the tough but troubled Vietnam war veteran, John Rambo. Scarred from his horrific experiences in Vietnam, Rambo is abused by a power hungry "red-necked" sherriff in a small town who imprisons him. However, a caged Rambo is a dangerous beast and when he escapes the explosive action begins. Putting credibility aside, this is a prime example of the action movie genre which launched the careers of actors like Stallone, Schwarzenegger and Van Damme.
